snippet: John O. Brennan was the top counterterrorism adviser during President Obama’s first term. He became one of the president’s most trusted advisers. Here are some of his statements on key issues.
lead_paragraph: John O. Brennan was the top counterterrorism adviser during President Obama’s first term. He became one of the president’s most trusted advisers. Here are some of his statements on key issues.

headline.seo: John O. Brennan on Key Issues
